extendedInfo.description: Shoot the enemy and travel through the galaxy! Shooter is the latest Magma Mobile Arcade game inspired by the famous old-school manic shooters. This Shoot 'em up (shmup or STG) will immerse you in a space environment aboard an aircraft where your goal is to shoot waves of enemies! This "bullet hell" game (also called danmaku) is easy-to-handle but hard to master! Indeed, the player will have to memorize levels and enemy attack patterns to confront overwhelming numbers of enemy projectiles. Using power ups will be very helpful in your adventure! Try first the Evolution mode and travel all over the galaxy to fight against bosses and win stars to buy a huge collection of items available on the store (garage)! Then, if you are an incredible player you will be able to unlock the Survival mode and numerous achievements! You will also have the opportunity to customize your spaceship to improve your gaming skills (life, attack, defense...). This HD Graphics Shooter will offer an intense experience for hardcore gamers yet remaining accessible to new casual gamers. Come play Shooter now for a great experience!

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Gives a gradius feel to a shooter which I\'ve missed lately. Controls need improvement because finger gets in way.
reviews.author: Robert Herrin

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: A good all around free shooter. It\'s not ground-breaking but is well made and fun.
reviews.author: Eric Flynn

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: This game is great! It\'s real good time sonsumer and the upgrades are awesome. Update it to make it even better.
reviews.author: Darrell Sanchez

reviews.title: addictive and fun
reviews.comment: its free and hours of fun ..high resolution game is awesome
reviews.author: Ron Elosge

reviews.title: Great free game
reviews.comment: No glitches. No freezing. Easy to play. Nice graphics. Droid RAZR HD.
reviews.author: Amy C

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: good but doesn\'t add more stars as you advance ..very hard to destroy large ship even with a large laser.should be able to go to second level faster...but fun overall..
reviews.author: Roger Foster

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Lol at first i thought this game was impossibly hard and i was trying over the top dodging. Than i realized only the center of the ship is a hitbox and the wings can be shot. Best space shooter I\'ve played on a smart phone period
reviews.author: Abdullah Syed

reviews.title: Arcade memories
reviews.comment: Fun game that reminds me of old arcade games of my youth. Selecting the more games option seriously locked up my tablet. Makes me a bit skiddish to try it again or other games.
reviews.author: Way Fountain

reviews.title: Great fun
reviews.comment: Amazing game great fun, good time killer and hardly any adds only suggestion add more ships and it would make it much better!! :D
reviews.author: daniel salkind

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: Easy to get a hang of, nice upgrade system and fun levels, I enjoy it! The levels increase in dificulty a bit to compensate for your newer form as you progress through to the next one.
reviews.author: Iashar Koranin

reviews.title: Great game!!
reviews.comment: Wonderful game. Easy to use.can pick up and play anytime. Replay ability very high.

reviews.comment: Fun, easy, simple. Do I really need to say more?

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Seriously great game. It would be five stars but it could be just a bit better. I don\'t know, like your stinger getting newer looks as you upgrade.

reviews.title: GREAT GAME!!!
reviews.comment: This is a very addictive game, so play at your own risk!!  It is now 1:19 AM and I\'ve been playing since about 11:00 PM (non-stop)!!

reviews.title: Nice game,
reviews.comment: Needs sound options of having sound effects and music separate rather than only having one option of muting everything

reviews.title: Very well done.
